mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_NO, BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_COMMENT_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') BOARD_COMMENT_DATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PROFILE, BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT, BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "BOARD_COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) C WHERE BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT = C.BOARD_COMMENT_NO AND BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') START WITH BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR BOARD_COMMENT_NO = BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT ORDER SIBLINGS BY BOARD_COMMENT_NO
